page.title: 12Churches:LORRAINE
page.content: In Irvinestown there are four churches Methodist,Presbyterian,the Church of Ireland and Sacred Heart church which is the Roman Catholic chapel.I go to the Church of Ireland which is up Church Street.At 10.30am on Sunday we have Sunday School for the children who havn't been confirmed.Confirmation means that you make promises to God, once confirmed you can take communion. Morning service in the church starts at 11.30am with hymns and prayers.The minister reads the announcements and preaches the sermon and the collection is taken up when we are singing the last hymn.Most subscribers put their offering in envelopes.At the communion service people come to the front of the church to have some wine and bread to remember the death of Jesus Christ. Special services are held at Christmas during Lent,Easter and Harvest.
